articles.author: Mike Rosenstein | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: Browns’ Odell Beckham forces LSU to self-impose bowl ban after illegal booster payments to players - NJ.com
articles.description: Cleveland Browns wide receiver Odell Beckham was seen handing out cash to LSU players after the Tigers beat Clemson, 42-25, in the College Football Playoff National Championship Game in January.
articles.content:
The hits just keep on coming.
ESPN reports LSU is self-imposing a bowl ban for the 2020 season after illegal booster payments to players by Cleveland Browns wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr.
